meanings.definition: The state of being without emotion.
meanings.sent1: Her emotionlessnesses made it hard for others to understand her feelings.
meanings.sent2: The emotionlessnesses of the robot made it seem cold and distant.
meanings.sent3: The emotionlessnesses of the stone statue was quite eerie.
meanings.sent4: In the silence of the room, his emotionlessnesses echoed loudly.
meanings.sent5: The emotionlessnesses of the empty house gave it a haunting feel.

meanings.definition: The quality or condition of lacking emotion.
meanings.sent1: The emotionlessnesses in his eyes revealed his inner turmoil.
meanings.sent2: Her emotionlessnesses during the sad movie surprised her friends.
meanings.sent3: The emotionlessnesses of the clown's face was both amusing and unsettling.
meanings.sent4: The emotionlessnesses of the ocean during the storm was both beautiful and terrifying.
meanings.sent5: His emotionlessnesses in the face of danger was admirable.
